thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Gary Lofts
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Gary Lofts

author: Gary Lofts
title: Gary Lofts
text:
When I started to research the installation of solar on my home I was a complete novice and knew little or nothing about the products or the industry. I referred to the web site often when reviewing the Quote: s I received, usually to verify information I had been given by sales staff. I found on many occasions the information on the web site helped me avoid the pitfalls of the industry and I have finished up with a system which meets my needs and at a good price.
Thank you
